product_name: Country Bean Caramel Flavoured Instant Coffee Powder, 60g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: It’s got a beautiful fragrance and taste of caramel along with a rich blend of coffee. What I love the most is the fact that you can adjust the taste of caramel according to your liking by altering the quantity! It tastes great with palm sugar as well ❤️
I am simply in love with this great tasting coffee.I have previously purchased the other flavours available from this brand and they are equally delightful
Got this as a gift the first timeBest coffee I've ever hadI Have it everydayI have ordered sooo many from amazon and the direct websiteGreat for self use and gifting
I am trying first time with flavoured coffee, and it turned out to be great. I preffered pure coffee flavour earlier, but this one with caramel flavour was different

So I've been drinking this coffee only for a month and I'm hooked to it. I've picked the vanilla flavour which is so good. The scent is good, the taste is strong..just the way I like it. Much better than other common instant coffee brands and totally value for money. I'll be purchasing this only from now on.

This is probably the best coffee I've had in a while. And that's saying something, considering the amount of coffee I drink.The caramel flavour is amazing and the coffee itself is quite balanced and not too bitter or acidic as most instant coffees tend to be.I drink it mostly black and without sugar, but I'm sure it can only be improved by the addition of milk and sweetness.Although it's a bit pricey and I went through one jar in less than two weeks, I'll definitely buy it again.
Love the aroma. This was my third purchase of the same variant. Dissolves completely and tasted good. I felt it's too overpriced.

reviews.review_title: I am in love with this coffee
reviews.review_body: I am a coffee addict and need at least 1 good cup of coffee in the middle of the day to pull through the rest of the day and thank god amazon suggested this coffee. The Caramel coffee is so nice. First sip and it made my day.All the coffee lovers who need their daily fix in office or otherwise Please get this coffee and you would not regret this.
